item.title: CVE-2022-38060|2024-09-16T21:08:57.753Z -- openstack -- openstack
item.description: A privilege escalation vulnerability exists in the sudo functionality of OpenStack Kolla git master 05194e7618. A misconfiguration in /etc/sudoers within a container can lead to increased privileges.
